column4: i have done a fresh install of 10.04 with existing home directory; in thunderbird 3, i have two folders of my two email accounts at the bottom of the folder list that are empty and thus useless to me, but i can't remove them
you should be able to edit that in your account preferences (Edit>Preferences) if not on the new installation, you should try on the installation in which you originally added the account
my accounts appear just fine at the top, but these two seem to be some lefotvers
also, i do not want to remove any of the accounts, only these empty folders
